Anitha kanthraj wrote:
> 
> 
> My test case requires the expected result to be the rowcount of a
> specific table so it can be compared with the actual result in the
> assert statement.As of now I have hard coded this value in the
> assert statement itself .My doubt is whether I can open a Db
> connection and execute a query  in the junit testcase itself so the 
> output that i get at runtime can be used inside the assert statement.

Sure you can. Just do it. It's straightforward.

> I'd appreciate it if I can get a code sample.

If you know JDBC, then that's all you need.
--
